description:
My PC was infected with the "Rhadamanthys" Infostealer malware on Oct 18, 2025, via a fake TradingView download link from a YouTube advertisement (Video ID: 7faWhx-bh30). The malware compromised my system and stole credentials/cookies.On Oct 25, 2025, the attacker drained my Phantom Wallet (Solana). They bypassed biometric security by using the stolen browser extension vault from my PC.Technical Details:Malware: Rhadamanthys Stealer & NetSupport Manager RAT.The funds (approx. 24.4 JitoSOL) represent a total loss. Please flag this address to prevent cash-out at centralized exchanges.

My PC was infected with the "Rhadamanthys" Infostealer malware on Oct 18, 2025, via a fake TradingView download link from a YouTube advertisement (Video ID: 7faWhx-bh30). The malware compromised my system and stole credentials/cookies.

On Oct 25, 2025, the attacker drained my Phantom Wallet (Solana). They bypassed biometric security by using the stolen browser extension vault from my PC.

Technical Details:

Malware: Rhadamanthys Stealer & NetSupport Manager RAT.

The funds (approx. 24.4 JitoSOL) represent a total loss. Please flag this address to prevent cash-out at centralized exchanges.

Amount lost

5800.00 USD
